about_the_game:
Join Mic, Sarah and Manny in a point and click misadventure to challenge paradoxes, ratcorns and windmills in a medieval fantasy land.

Try our demo!

Play the first steps for free and get the vibe of the game.
Don't forget to add it to your wishlist if you enjoyed it.

The game

There is an accident waiting to happen in a faculty. Manny is the professor assigned to out-of-the-box research at the university. He is about to discover the inaccuracies in his calculations regarding time displacement with a transport prototype.

Meanwhile, Mic is nearby, ready to go back home and plan a tabletop RPG session. Sadly, something is about to delay those plans a few thousand years.

Such an anomaly quickly changes the peaceful lands of Lord Nicola. Some things start appearing at random places and others vanish inexplicably. It's up to the town's new hero to find out everything, helping the town and himself.

Highlights

  • 6 hours or more to finish (way more if you enjoy trying all the posible interactions)
  • Linear progression
  • Funny geek interactions
  • Verb token actions
  • Easy, Normal and Hard modes
  • Story and Hidden Achievements

Specifications

  • 2D hand-drawn scenes and characters
  • 31 playable scenes
  • 2 playable characters (one has 4 modes after the introduction)
  • 11 unique NPCs
  • 95 unique items
  • 4 minigames
  • Over 10,000 dialogue lines
  • We are hoping to add more languages and platform options in the future

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bits
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, 1 GB dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Point and Click adventure in a medieval fantasy ambience. Imagine you are a random tabletop geek looking for new adventures and your friend makes a tiiny mistake with his time machine... Now add an adventurer, a noble and a detective and mix them all together in yourself. Adventure awaits!
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
